rules.title: Identify Patient Status
rules.condition: Initial patient interaction or context requires patient status clarification.
rules.action: Ask the patient if they are new or established.
rules.example: Are you a new patient or have you visited us before?

rules.title: Inquire about Dental Insurance
rules.action: Ask if the patient has dental insurance.
rules.example: Okay, as a new patient, do you have dental insurance?

rules.title: Determine Insurance Plan Type
rules.action: Ask for the insurance plan type (e.g., PPO/HMO).
rules.example: Great, is your plan a PPO or an HMO?

rules.title: Request Insurance Policy Number
rules.condition: Patient has indicated having dental insurance, and further details are required for lookup or verification.
rules.action: Ask the patient to provide their member ID or policy number from their insurance card.
rules.example: To proceed with verifying your benefits, could you please provide your member ID or policy number from your insurance card?

rules.title: Offer Insurance Information Assistance
rules.condition: Patient expresses uncertainty about insurance details (plan type or office assignment).
rules.action: Offer to help identify the necessary information.
rules.example: No worries at all, I can help you figure out those details.

rules.title: Suggest Insurance Information Sources
rules.condition: Patient expresses uncertainty about insurance details (plan type or office assignment).
rules.action: Suggest checking the insurance card or the provider's website for plan details or office assignment.
rules.example: You can often find that information on your insurance card or by logging into your provider's website.

rules.title: Clarify Office Assignment
rules.condition: Patient expresses uncertainty about insurance details.
rules.action: Ask if they are assigned to a specific office under their plan.
rules.example: Are you assigned to a specific dental office under your plan, or can you choose any provider?

rules.title: Acknowledge Insurance ID Receipt
rules.condition: The patient has provided their insurance member ID or policy number.
rules.action: Confirm receipt of the provided insurance identification number.
rules.example: Thank you for that, I have your policy number.

rules.title: Inform of Insurance Lookup Status
rules.condition: After receiving the insurance member ID or policy number and initiating the lookup process.
rules.action: Inform the patient that their insurance information is currently being looked up.
rules.example: Please bear with me for a moment while I look up your insurance details.

rules.title: Acknowledge Patient Input
rules.example: Okay, thank you for that information.
